generateSymmetricKey(len, nonce)¶

Generate a symmetric key used in AESGCM with a lenght (suggested 192/256 bit ) and pass a nonce used with the key to cipher a text (each operation has its own couple of <key,nonce> in order to guarantee security)

Parameters:

  • nonce (Int) – The nonce used to encrypt/decrypt
Return type:

Int
Returns:

The operations are done correctly
